description: Surrogate primary key for this record in the vehicle class lookup; uniquely identifies one class entry.
Audit timestamp for this record, with millisecond precision; indicates when the entry was created or last updated. Timezone unspecified; confirm with SME.
Human-readable vehicle classification (body style and drivetrain) used for fleet categorization, pricing, and reporting.
Identifier of the corresponding record in a legacy source system; used for migration, deduplication, or cross-system mapping. Exact source and format may vary; confirm with SME.
Name of the legacy source table or entity from which this record originated; supports lineage and reconciliation. Likely populated during migration; confirm with SME.
